vision_analysis.question_text: Which of the following best describes your household?
clickable_elements: Couple/single with young family (youngest child is aged 5 years or under)
Couple/single with middle aged family (youngest child is aged 6-12 years)
Couple/single with older family (youngest child is aged 13-18 years)
Couple/single with older family (youngest person is aged over 18 years)

automation.response_value: Couple/single with older family (youngest person is aged over 18 years)
